item.description: Hope u can make it out 2 the Western Fair-open today. Don't forget your local fairs, too. Lots of them in the coming weeks around #LKM!

item.title: Mentioned by Chatham Daily News
item.description:
Chatham-Kent trailer maker recognized
Lambton-Kent-Middlesex MP Bev Shipley, left, presents a certificate to Amelia and Denis Marcus of Comptank Corp. in Bothwell, a sister company of Harold Marcus Ltd., on the completion of the 700th tank trailer used to haul corrosive material on the highway.
